meanings.definition: Not relating to or involving management.
meanings.sent1: The nonmanagerial staff members focus on their specific tasks.
meanings.sent2: She prefers a nonmanagerial role where she can work independently.
meanings.sent3: The nonmanagerial team had a picnic to celebrate their hard work.
meanings.sent4: In the nonmanagerial world, each person plays a vital role like a piece in a puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The nonmanagerial duties include data entry and customer service.

meanings.sent1: He is content with his nonmanagerial job and enjoys the work-life balance.
meanings.sent2: The nonmanagerial employees have regular shifts and do not oversee others.
meanings.sent3: The nonmanagerial group decided to have a movie night after work.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a nonmanagerial player in the game of corporate hierarchy.
meanings.sent5: The nonmanagerial role requires attention to detail and teamwork.
